question: Can women when praying any Salaah in their homes, recite the Qiraat out loud? Also to teach kids, can we pray the complete Salaat out loud, include all the tasbeehs in Rukoo, and Sajood?
answer:
QUESTION
(ofcourse no strange men present when reading out loud)
ANSWER


Share:
When a woman performs her Fardh or Sunnats Salaat individually at home, she
cannot make Jahri (audible) Qiraat. She may conduct a separate exercise of
Salaat in order to teach her children the procedure of Salaat.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
